        <general>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Poetry in the Irish class.</string>
            <string language="es">Poesía en la clase de irlandés.</string>
            <string language="ga">Filíocht sa Rang Gaeilge.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Poesie in der irischen Kategorie.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Poésie dans la classe irlandaise.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Poesia na classe irish.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Poesia nel codice categoria irlandese.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποίηση στην ιρλανδική κλάση.</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Introduction and suggestions as well as various teaching methods fo poetry.</string>
            <string language="es">Introducción y sugerencias así como varios métodos de enseñanza de poesía.</string>
            <string language="ga">Réamhrá agus moltaí chomh maith le modhanna múinte éagsúla don fhilíocht.</string>
          </description>
          <language>ga</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Irish</string>
            <string language="es">Irlandés. Hoja de consejos</string>
            <string language="ga">Gaeilge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Bileog Chomhairle</string>
            <string language="ga">Advice Sheet</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einleitung und Vorschläge sowie verschiedene 
unterrichtende Methoden fo Poesie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Introduction et suggestions aussi bien que la diverse 
poésie d'enseignement de fo de méthodes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Introdução e sugestões as.well.as a vária poesia 
ensinando do fo dos métodos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Introduzione e suggerimenti così come la varia poesia 
d'istruzione di fo di metodi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εισαγωγή και προτάσεις καθώς επίσης και διάφορη 
ποίηση των FO μεθόδων διδασκαλίας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
